tech_news.title: Nintendo Set to Finally Acknowledge Donkey Kong: Bananza's Secret Character — And Fans Are Now Convinced The Timing Points to Mario Kart World DLC - IGN
tech_news.description: As Nintendo finally looks set to acknowledge a certain secret character's presence in Donkey Kong: Bananza, fans are taking the moment as further evidence of upcoming, unannounced Mario Kart World DLC.

tech_news.title: Microsoft finally has a better looking Run dialog for Windows 11 - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft is testing a new modern design for the Run prompt in Windows 11. The overhauled design is optional, and looks a lot more like a launcher.

World of Warcraft's Housing Feature Is Now Live, and Horde Players Are Desperately Trying to Reinvent Their Spiky Huts - IGN
tech_news.description: World of Warcraft's housing feature launched this week for everyone who purchased the upcoming Midnight expansion early. And Horde players in particular are really struggling to contend with one major issue: their house exteriors are ugly.

tech_news.title: Nintendo’s Switch 2 Mario Kart bundle is on sale at Amazon again for $50 off - The Verge
tech_news.description: The Switch 2 is still relatively new, so deals are rare. However, you can still get Nintendo’s latest console with a free copy of Mario Kart World for a limited time.
